meanings.definition: A unit of electrical conductance equal to one reciprocal ohm.
meanings.sent1: She measured the conductivity of the solution in abmhos.
meanings.sent2: The electronic device showed a reading of 5 abmhos.
meanings.sent3: The abmho race between the electrons was quite electrifying.

meanings.definition: A unit of electrical conductance equal to one siemens.
meanings.sent1: The circuit had a high level of abmho, indicating good conductivity.
meanings.sent2: The abmho value of the wire was crucial for the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The abmho party was a shocking success.
